title: Have T3s, T202s, T206s and E254s for trade
author: jerrys

posts.post_title: Have T3s, T202s, T206s and E254s for trade
posts.post_content:
Wanted: R305s, PC760s and PC775s.
Mid to upper SGC or PSA graded cards only.
Please e-mail if interested.

The T3 cabinets were scanned before being encapsulated by SGC.

Bridwell SGC 60
Criger SGC 60
Magee SGC 50
Paskert SGC 50

[IMG]http://gls234.webs.com/t3.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://gls234.webs.com/t206.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://gls234.webs.com/t202a.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://gls234.webs.com/e254a.jpg[/IMG]

Nothing to trade from your list, but would take the Carrigan off your hands for a good price.

Rawn

Email sent on T202's for R305.

Kevin
